conbody.p: (b) See MP5301.601-90 Head of Agency (HoA), Senior Procurement Executive (SPE), Service Acquisition Executive (SAE) Delegation Matrix. The request must state why the notice is not appropriate or reasonable and identify alternative actions to optimize opportunities for small business participation.
